rules_text:
Deception {3}{W} [i]({3}{W}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Flying
When Virtue of Dawn enters, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If Virtue of Dawn is attacking, you may have that creature enters the battlefield tapped and attacking.
